name: Hammerspace
description:
You have access to an extradimensional, instantly accessible storage area allowing the user to produce objects out of thin air.

Take advantage of this phenomenon in VR to whack, slice, splatter, blow up, and obliterate hordes of fully destructible enemies  in this first look demo of Hammerspace.

Available for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

Featured in this demo are:

- Over 50 weapons and objects that can be used as weapons

- 3 unique levels to dominate

- Countless enemies to mow down

We plan to release the full game for $10 on itch.io and Steam when the game is complete.

We are a very small studio so (if you feel inclined) consider donating! Any small amount helps us greatly and really encourages us to keep doing what we're doing.
